title: Register FO-10 in navigation and create info page
description:
## Objective

Register FO-10 in the navigation configuration and create the info page describing the feature.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md` — Section: "Overview"

## Scope

**Files to create/modify:**
- `app/fo-10/info/page.tsx` — info page describing FO-10
- `nav.config.ts` — register FO-10 route
- `app/page.tsx` — add FO-10 to overview page if needed

**Key existing code:**
- `app/fo-09/info/page.tsx` — reference for info page structure
- `nav.config.ts` — existing navigation config

## Implementation

1. Create info page describing FO-10's "fixed rails, dynamic options" approach
2. Add FO-10 entry to nav.config.ts
3. Update overview page to include FO-10 link
4. Verify navigation works: http://localhost:3000/fo-10 and http://localhost:3000/fo-10/info

## Tests

1. TypeScript compilation: `npx tsc --noEmit` passes
2. Dev server: navigate to /fo-10 and /fo-10/info without errors
3. Overview page shows FO-10 link

Do NOT close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes and navigation works
closed_reason: Successfully registered FO-10 in navigation and created info page. Created app/fo-10/info/page.tsx describing the fixed rails, dynamic options approach. Updated nav.config.ts with FO-10 navigation entry (Demo + Info). Updated app/overview/page.tsx to include FO-10 in versions list and comparison table. TypeScript compilation passes, navigation works correctly.
